summary: Illusion bored me to death in the vanilla game, so I added 9 new spells
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading] REQUIRES SKSE [/heading][/center]

[b]Did you find vanilla illusion spells useless and boring? If so this might be the mod for you.[/b]

This spell pack adds 9 new spells to the game.They are added to lvl lists and can be bought from Drevis Neloren at the College of Winterhold. It takes about 48 in game hours for them to appear.

The spells are:

[heading] Apprentice [/heading]
[list]
[*]Read Mind - displays targets basic info on screen, useful for choosing followers
[/list]

[heading] Adept [/heading]
[list]
[*]Mind Control - gain control over an npc, cant attack during that time. lasts 30s
[/list]

[heading] Expert [/heading]
[list]
[*]Brainwash - target will aid you in battle for 30s
[*]Perfect Crime - if your current hold bounty is less than 300, it is removed
[*]Fade Other - a vanilla spell actually, but was never implemented. works like invisibility on others
[*]Bandit Disguise - disguise yourself as a bandit, bandits dont attack you for 2mins
[*]Forsworn Disguise - disguise yourself as a forsworn , forsworn dont attack you for 2mins
[/list]

[heading] Master [/heading]
[list]
[*]Mindblow - target's mind is completely disabled for 30s, target acts like a fish on dry land
[*]Mark As Enemy - the target becomes hated by everyone
[/list]
author: Junglemaster
